arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّـهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
اَللَّهُمَّ بِحَقِّ هٰذَا القُرْآنِ
وَبِحَقِّ مَنْ أَرْسَلْتَهُ بِهِ
وَبِحَقِّ كُلِّ مُؤْمِنٍ مَدَحْتَهُ فِيْهِ
وَبِحَقِّكَ عَلَيْهِمْ
فَلَا أَحَدَ أَعْرَفُ بِحَقِّكَ مِنْكَ

translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
O Allah: for the sake of this (Holy] Qur'an,
and for the sake of that person through whom You sent it,
and for the sake of those believers who have been praised therein,
and in the name of Your obligation to them,
no one is aware of Your obligation more than You
